attributes.action: Lower the prices of care homes
attributes.additional_details: No person in there older years should end up lonely or even depressed just because they are unable to afford care, leaving them with no social life
attributes.background: lower the prices of care homes so elderly’s aren’t left lonely

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review the affordability of care homes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711679
